titleStmt.title: King Iames his entertainment at Theobalds vvith his welcome to London, together with a salutatorie poeme. / By Iohn Sauile.
titleStmt.author: Savile, John, poet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, and are to be sould at the house of T. Este,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
